title: How to Remove SMS from Messenger

steps.title: Open Messenger.
steps.content: Open Messenger. This app icon looks like a white lightning bolt in a blue speech bubble that you can find on the home screen or in the app drawer. This feature is only available on Android phones. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This is usually in the top left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap SMS.
steps.content: Tap SMS . It's under the "Preferences" header.

steps.title: Tap the switch to the off position .
steps.content: Tap the switch to the off position . With SMS disabled, you'll have to use another application (or the default messaging application that came with your phone) to access your SMS. You will most likely be prompted to choose a default SMS application when you disable SMS in Messenger.
